ygData.subject: Re: Spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought feign death in Neriak, I ve also seen it for sale in both Qeynos and Freeport.  Definitely get this spell, it s saved my hide on numerous occasions.
ygData.messageBody:
I bought feign death in Neriak, I've also seen it for sale in both Qeynos
and Freeport. Definitely get this spell, it's saved my hide on numerous
occasions. I don't have banshee aura yet, and I'm not sure if I'll get it
or not, as I don't melee much now anyway, that plus the need for the cat's
eye agates has me a bit turned off on it.


----- Original Message -----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 9:28 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Spells


Will my gnome Necro be KOS in Grobb in the Necro Guild??
I might just research Banshee Aura, is it worth researching?

Also Feign Death is research only right?

Thanks



----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Wooldirdge
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 10:12 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Spells


Banshe Aura is found in Grobb. The rest of those I all bought in the
Necromancer guild, check in the Necro side and the SK side.
